verses.verse: My <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> not the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the Lord of <S%G1391>glory,<s%> with <S%G4382>respect<s%> of <S%G4382>persons.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> there <S%G1525>come<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4864>assembly<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> with a <S%G5554>gold<s%> <S%G5554>ring,<s%> in <S%G2986>goodly<s%> <S%G2066>apparel,<s%> and there <S%G1525>come<s%> in <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G4434>poor<s%> man in <S%G4508>vile<s%> <S%G2066>raiment;<s%>

And you have <S%G1914>respect<s%> to him that <S%G5409>wears<s%> the <S%G2986>gay<s%> <S%G2066>clothing,<s%> and <S%G2036>say<s%> to him, <S%G2521>Sit<s%> you <S%G5602>here<s%> in a <S%G2573>good<s%> place; and <S%G2036>say<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> <S%G2476>Stand<s%> you <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> my <S%G5286>footstool:<s%>
Are you not <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G1252>partial<s%> in <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> and are <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2923>judges<s%> of <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts?<s%>

<S%G191>Listen,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> Has not <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G1861>promised<s%> to them that <S%G25>love<s%> him?
But you have <S%G818>despised<s%> the <S%G4434>poor.<s%> Do not <S%G4145>rich<s%> men <S%G2616>oppress<s%> you, and <S%G1670>draw<s%> you <S%G1519>before<s%> the <S%G2922>judgment<s%> seats?
Do not they <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> that <S%G2570>worthy<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> by the <S%G3588>which<s%> you are <S%G1941>called?<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G937>royal<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1124>scripture,<s%> You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well:<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you have <S%G4380>respect<s%> to <S%G4380>persons,<s%> you <S%G2038>commit<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> and are <S%G1651>convinced<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> as <S%G3848>transgressors.<s%>
For <S%G3748>whoever<s%> shall <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> and yet <S%G4417>offend<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> point, he is <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For he that <S%G2036>said,<s%> Do not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> Do not <S%G5407>kill.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> if you <S%G5407>kill,<s%> you are <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> you, and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> as they that shall be <S%G2919>judged<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty.<s%>

For he shall have <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G448>without<s%> <S%G448>mercy,<s%> that has <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1656>mercy;<s%> and <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2620>rejoices<s%> <S%G2620>against<s%> <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> does it <S%G3786>profit,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G2041>works?<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> him?
<S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%> be <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and <S%G3007>destitute<s%> of <S%G2184>daily<s%> <S%G5160>food,<s%>

And <S%G5100>one<s%> of you <S%G2036>say<s%> to them, <S%G5217>Depart<s%> in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> be you <S%G2328>warmed<s%> and <S%G5526>filled;<s%> notwithstanding you <S%G1325>give<s%> them not <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G2006>needful<s%> to the <S%G4983>body;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> does it <S%G3786>profit?<s%>
<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G2192>has<s%> not <S%G2041>works,<s%> is <S%G3498>dead,<s%> being <S%G2596>alone.<s%> <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G235>Yes,<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> may <S%G2046>say,<s%> You <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and I have <S%G2041>works:<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> me your <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> and I will <S%G1166>show<s%> you my <S%G4102>faith<s%> by my <S%G2041>works.<s%>

You <S%G4100>believe<s%> that there is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well:<s%> the <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe,<s%> and <S%G5425>tremble.<s%>
But <S%G2309>will<s%> you <S%G1097>know,<s%> O <S%G2756>vain<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> that <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> is <S%G3498>dead?<s%>
Was not <S%G11>Abraham<s%> our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> when he had <S%G399>offered<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> his <S%G5207>son<s%> on the <S%G2379>altar?<s%>
<S%G991>See<s%> you <S%G3754>how<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4903>worked<s%> with his <S%G2041>works,<s%> and by <S%G2041>works<s%> was <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect?<s%>

And the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and it was <S%G3049>imputed<s%> to him for <S%G1343>righteousness:<s%> and he was <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5384>Friend<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
You <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G5106>then<s%> how that by <S%G2041>works<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified,<s%> and not by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3440>only.<s%>

<S%G3668>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was not <S%G4460>Rahab<s%> the <S%G4204>harlot<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G2041>works,<s%> when she had <S%G5264>received<s%> the <S%G32>messengers,<s%> and had <S%G1524>sent<s%> them out <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3598>way?<s%>

For as the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> is <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>
